sentences.en: Article 61 The duties of a liquidator are as follows.
sentences.cn: 第61条(清算人之职务)清算人之职务如左.

sentences.en: One of the company directors was appointed liquidator.
sentences.cn: 其中一名董事被指定为公司清算人.

sentences.en: The court may dismiss a liquidator whenever it deems necessary.
sentences.cn: 法院认为必要时,得将清算人解任之.

sentences.en: The creditors are notified of the progress of the liquidation by progress reports the liquidator.
sentences.cn: 清盘人将会以提交报告的形式向债权人汇报清盘的进度.

sentences.en: Upon being inquired, the liquidator shall provide answers about the liquidation immediately.
sentences.cn: 清算人遇有询问时, 应将清算情形,随时答覆.

words.tran_cn: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的
流动性；流动资产；[金融] 偿债能力

trans.tran_en: an official whose job is to close a company and use any money obtained to pay its debts
